attributes.action: Urge the US Government to allow reciprocal travel between the UK and USA
attributes.additional_details:
Proclamation 10143 has been in effect since March 2020. Americans can travel to the UK, but UK citizens cannot visit the USA unless they fit into a very specific category of exemptions (which most people do not). 

The UK's COVID rates have fallen dramatically and our vaccine numbers are higher than the USA, with over 40% of people fully vaccinated, and over 70% of people having had 1 dose.

Families are separated and people with legitimate jobs cannot get visas. This needs to change!
attributes.background: The ban that the USA imposed on the UK has had no updates for months. It is no longer a ban that follows science or logic. The Government need to work with the USA to enable travel between the two countries, with protective measures, eg test on arrival & departure.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Seek to negotiate a travel corridor between the USA and UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581833
